src:
Skuat Muda Chelsea Diklaim Sanggup Jadi Juara
05 Nov 2019, 21:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah keyakinan diungkapkan oleh Mason Mount. Playmaker Chelsea itu meyakini bahwa timnya bakal menjadi juara dengan komposisi mayoritas pemain muda.
Musim ini, ada perubahan yang cukup signifikan di skuat Chelsea. Pelatih baru mereka, Frank Lampard mengorbitkan banyak pemain muda ke skuat utama The Blues, setelah timnya mendapatkan embargo transfer.
Meski tidak terlalu diunggulkan pada awal musim kemarin, skuat Chelsea bermain di luar ekspektasi. Mereka kini berhasil menempati peringkat empat klasemen sementara EPL.
Mount menilai bahwa dengan komposisi timnya seperti ini, timnya mampu menjadi juara dalam waktu dekat. "Kami ingin memenangkan trofi juara dan kami ingin berada di puncak klasemen Liga," ujar Mount yang dikutip Sportsmole.

Baca komentar lengkap sang geladnang di bawah ini.
text:
Chelsea Young Squad Claimed Able To Become Champion
05 Nov 2019, 21:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A belief expressed by Mason Mount. The Chelsea playmaker believes that his team will be champions with a composition of the majority of young players.
This season, there have been significant changes in the Chelsea squad. Their new coach, Frank Lampard orbiting many young players to the Blues main squad, after his team received a transfer embargo.
Although not very favored at the start of last season, the Chelsea squad played beyond expectations. They are now ranked fourth in the EPL standings.
Mount considered that with the composition of his team like this, his team could become champions in the near future. "We want to win the championship trophy and we want to be at the top of the league table," Mount was quoted as saying by Sportsmole.

Read the complete comment from the winger below.
